full_summary:
## Tender Title: M5000-240723 Snowmobiles 540cc Minimum

### Solicitation Number: WS4275961534

#### Published: November 7, 2023

* Amendment: 4
* Closing Date: December 19, 2023, 14:00 EST

### Scope of Work

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires snowmobiles with a minimum engine capacity of 540cc. The primary role of these snowmobiles will be to support police operations, including:

* Patrol and surveillance
* Personnel transport
* Search and rescue

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to various international trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contract Award

The contract award is expected to take place on December 15, 2023, with a contract end date on November 30, 2024.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Ashley Tegart (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [ashley.tegart@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ashley.tegart@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Telephone: N/A

### Required Documentation

Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by December 18, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. This procurement is subject to the Directive on Government Contracts, Including Real Property Leases, in the Nunavut Settlement Area.

### Important Note

Please ignore the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted
